label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"黄曲霉毒素","labels":["disease"]},{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"黄曲霉","labels":["disease"]},{"start":32,"end":37,"text":"黄曲霉中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":38,"end":43,"text":"人畜共患病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":49,"end":52,"text":"黄曲霉","labels":["disease"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":66,"end":70,"text":"肝脏受损","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":68,"end":70,"text":"受损","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":71,"end":75,"text":"全身出血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":76,"end":80,"text":"神经症状","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 黄曲霉毒素是黄曲霉的代谢产物，广泛存在于发霉变质的食物和饲料中，黄曲霉中毒是人畜共患病之一。家禽对黄曲霉比较敏感，摄入大量则中毒。以肝脏受损、全身出血和神经症状等为特征。

label: [{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"黄曲霉菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"寄生曲霉","labels":["disease"]},{"start":65,"end":68,"text":"黄曲霉","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 由于采食了被黄曲霉菌或寄生曲霉等污染含有毒素的饲料而引起。各种饲料特别是玉米、花生粕、豆粕、棉籽饼、麸皮、小麦、大麦等作物最易感染黄曲霉。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"黄曲霉菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":31,"end":36,"text":"黄曲霉毒素","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 黄曲霉菌广泛存在于自然界，在温暖潮湿的环境中最易生长繁殖，产生黄曲霉毒素。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"黄曲霉毒素","labels":["disease"]},{"start":56,"end":59,"text":"幼龄鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 黄曲霉毒素及其衍生物有20余种，引起家禽中毒的主要毒素有B₁、B₂、G₁、G₂、M₁、M₂,以B₁的毒性最强，以幼龄鸡为敏感。

label: [{"start":16,"end":17,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"发病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 调查病因时可见凡吃食了可疑饲料的鸡与发病率呈正相关，发病鸡无传染性。

label: [{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"肉用仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"急性中毒","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"食欲减退","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"消瘦虚弱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"鸡冠苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"凄叫","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":51,"end":60,"text":"排淡绿色或白色稀粪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":56,"end":58,"text":"白色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":52,"end":55,"text":"淡绿色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":61,"end":65,"text":"有时带血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":59,"end":60,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 6周以下的雏鸡尤其是肉用仔鸡耐受量小，多为急性中毒。表现精神沉郁，食欲减退，消瘦虚弱，鸡冠苍白，凄叫，排淡绿色或白色稀粪，有时带血。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"翅下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"共济失调","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":9,"end":17,"text":"呈角弓反张状死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"产蛋减少","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":42,"end":47,"text":"开产期推迟","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":51,"end":62,"text":"极度消瘦的恶病质而死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"翅","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"青年蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":26,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 翅下垂，共济失调，呈角弓反张状死亡。青年蛋鸡和成年鸡耐受性稍高，病情缓和，产蛋减少或开产期推迟，个别呈极度消瘦的恶病质而死亡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"急性中毒","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":13,"text":"皮下和肌肉出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"肝脏充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"色黄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"胆囊扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"胆囊","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 急性中毒表现皮下和肌肉出血。肝脏充血、肿大、出血及坏死，色黄，胆囊扩张。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"肺普遍严重出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":20,"text":"腺胃黏膜有点状出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"点状出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":30,"text":"十二指肠弥漫性出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":30,"text":"弥漫性出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":36,"text":"肾苍白肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"苍白肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"腺胃黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"十二指肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":32,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肺普遍严重出血、水肿。腺胃黏膜有点状出血，十二指肠弥漫性出血。肾苍白肿大。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"慢性中毒","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"肝硬化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"硬化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"呈黄土色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":28,"text":"白色点状结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"伴有腹水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":38,"text":"心包积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":7,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 慢性中毒常见肝硬化、萎缩、呈黄土色，个别可见白色点状结节，伴有腹水。心包积水。

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"防霉","labels":["control"]},{"start":49,"end":53,"text":"注意通凤","labels":["control"]}]
text: (1)防霉。引起霉败的条件主要是水分和温度。因此，粮食收割后要防止雨淋，晾晒，贮藏控制温度、湿度，注意通凤。

label: [{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"环氧乙烷","labels":["drug"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"福尔马林","labels":["drug"]},{"start":38,"end":41,"text":"防霉剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"制霉菌素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"熏蒸消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":32,"end":47,"text":"在饲料中加入防霉剂和制霉菌素等","labels":["control"]}]
text: 为防止饲粮发霉，可用福尔马林、环氧乙烷等对饲料进行熏蒸消毒。也可在饲料中加入防霉剂和制霉菌素等。

label: [{"start":6,"end":15,"text":"拣去霉粒再进行水洗","labels":["control"]},{"start":22,"end":27,"text":"漂白粉溶液","labels":["drug"]},{"start":37,"end":43,"text":"清水浸洗多次","labels":["control"]}]
text: (2)去毒。拣去霉粒再进行水洗，用0.1%的漂白粉溶液浸泡4~6小时，再用清水浸洗多次，直至浸泡水无色为宜。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"立即停喂霉变饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"更换新料","labels":["control"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"急性中毒","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"葡萄糖水","labels":["drug"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"维生素C","labels":["drug"]},{"start":35,"end":40,"text":"维生素K₃","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 立即停喂霉变饲料，更换新料。急性中毒可饮用5%葡萄糖水或口服维生素C和维生素K₃各1片。
